iti77:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti77:2.1: “This body is fragile, mendicants, consciousness is liable to fade away, and all attachments are impermanent, suffering, and perishable.”
iti77:2.2: That is what the Buddha said.
iti77:3.3: and seeing the danger in attachments,
iti77:3.4: they go beyond birth and death.
iti77:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
